examples.text: does one shitty thing ever happen to you & amp ;
being called out for your DPS by the shitty healer ?
I didn't ask for shitty hair , I asked for $1 Billion http

wates last night . I sent a rather shitty email last night so that told them !

senses.synonym: shitty: very bad; 'a lousy play'; 'it's a stinking world' <i6181>
